DMDCA Designation: Conservation Area- Name: HADLEY WOOD- Policy: DMD 37-44- Core Strategy: Core policy 30-31

description: Works to tree covered by LBE order no 412 2020: 1x eucalyptus (T01) root prune up to 2m from the stem to a depth of up to 8cm in depth.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: The application does not satisfactorily address the first reason for refusal of the previous application ref. 25/00373/TPO. In addition, insufficient and contradictory information has been provided as to the proposals which could have a significantly negative impact upon the tree's long-term health, stability and amenity value. In the absence of sufficient supporting information to demonstrate the necessity of the proposals, the stated reasons for the work are considered unjustified.
